column3: definition
P and a 5 digit number, with leading zeros if necessary, p.e. P00001
Family name of a person by which he/she is commonly known; i.e. Lu for Lu Xun (instead of Zhou Shuren), Bei for Bei Dao (not Zhao Zhenkai)
First name
Language of this name, EN, ZH_PY, ZH_HZ etc.
records whether or when a person experienced rustication; write "no", if not, provide year for yes
place of rustication (or major place of rustication if several)
provide birth year here
provide death  year here
Alternative family name, under which a person may also be known, i.e. Zhou Shuren for Lu Xun or Zhao Zhenkai for Bei Dao; could also be a pseudonym of a person; but not more than one alternative name
Language of this name, EN, ZH_PY, ZH_HZ etc.
Record city / town where a person was born
Record social position of a person: worker, party cadre, university professor, teacher, farmer…
Reference to person ID for a person's father
Reference to person ID for a person's mother
Record whether a person had access to neibu material: yes/no
Reference to text in which a reading is recorded; for person entries for authors of autobiographical texts or of academic texts, this can be left empty
Page number in text that the colum source_id refers to
date of creation of line
name of project member creating this line; use acronym

name of project member last modifying this line; use acronym
SP and a 4 digit number, with leading zeros if necessary, p.e. SP0001
Name of a social position
Beginning (year) of a social position
End (year) of a social position; if only one year / point in time then use same as start year, p.e. 1968-1968

T and a 5 digit number, with leading zeros if necessary, p.e. T00001

Title of a text; for the texts discussed by readers in autobiographical texts, create separate lines for a) title in Chinese characters; b) title in original language (if German, French, Italian, English) or English (esp. for texts originally in Russian)
Language of this title EN, ZH_PY, ZH_HZ etc.
Refer to genre IS
place of first publication

name of publishing house; provide pinyin for Chinese publishing houses
year of first edition in China
yes/no whether this was originally a neibu publication
Reference to text in which a reading is reorded; column may remain empty if this line records an academic or autobiographical text
Page number in text that the colum source_id refers to
Space for background information on the text, if necessary; for example reference to translation of a poem into English; on when a text was written…
